0.text: Innate: Kassadin is permanently  ghosted and takes 15%  reduced  magic damage.
Active: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at the target enemy that upon arrival deals them magic damage and  disrupts their ongoing  channels.

1.text: The excess energy forms around Kassadin, granting him a  shield that absorbs magic damage for 1.5 seconds.

0.text: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks deal 20 (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage.

1.text: Active: Kassadin empowers his blade, causing his next basic attack within the next 5 seconds to have an  uncancelable windup, gain  50 bonus range, deal increased bonus magic damage, and restore  mana, with the restoration amount quintupled against  champions.

2.text: Nether Blade  resets Kassadin's basic attack timer.

0.text: Passive: Kassadin gains a Void Energy stack each time he or a nearby  champion uses an ability, stacking up to 6 times. At 6 stacks, Kassadin gains the ability to cast Force Pulse.

1.text: Active: Kassadin emits a pulse of void energy in a cone in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area and  slowing them for 1 second.

0.text: Active: Kassadin  blinks from his current location towards the target location and upon arrival deals magic damage to all nearby enemies.

1.text: Each subsequent Riftwalk cast within 15 seconds doubles its  mana cost and deals bonus damage, stacking up to 4 times.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants ability power equal to 3% bonus mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge and grants 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if it's a champion, up to maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +360 mana.
